title: Process Group Sales Payment
description: A corporate group that had tickets on hold is now ready to pay for their block of 100 tickets.

tasks.description: Look up the group's reservation and invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the held reservation and the corresponding invoice.

tasks.description: Process the payment using the corporate credit card provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment for the full invoice amount.

tasks.description: Release the hold on the tickets and deliver them to the group's organizer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the seats and sends a link for the organizer to manage and distribute the digital tickets.
